tasks.label: kill-server-if-running
args: echo 'Checking if server is running on port 8000...'; if lsof -ti :8000 > /dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Found process on port 8000, killing it...'; lsof -ti :8000 | xargs kill -9; sleep 1; echo 'Process killed.'; else echo 'No process found on port 8000.'; fi

tasks.label: wait-for-server
args: echo 'Waiting for FastAPI server to start...'; for i in {1..60}; do if curl -s http://localhost:8000/health > /dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Server is ready!'; exit 0; fi; echo 'Attempt $i: Server not ready, waiting...'; sleep 2; done; echo 'Server failed to start within 120 seconds'; exit 1

tasks.label: wait-for-server-long
args: echo 'Waiting extra time for FastAPI server to start in compound mode...'; sleep 5; for i in {1..60}; do if curl -s http://localhost:8000/health > /dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Server is ready!'; exit 0; fi; echo 'Attempt $i: Server not ready, waiting...'; sleep 3; done; echo 'Server failed to start within 180 seconds'; exit 1
